channel.title: Next Uncut Chapter?
channel.description: Which chapter is going to be uncut next, also which chapters will you like to see uncut? I personally think Residue processing could use a remake.

item.title: Next Uncut Chapter?
item.dc:creator: KevinJRattman
item.description:
Just because they’ve done Surface Tension doesn’t mean they should remake other chapters as well. Although I do think Crowbar Collective missed a great opportunity to name this update "Black Mesa: Bigger, Longer & Uncut"…

But in all seriousness, the only thing we have left is the addition of final levels, and an edible taco props in cafeteria in Office Complex. No need to remake existing levels.

Read full topic

item.title: Next Uncut Chapter?
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
When we get around to restoring it, BMPD will be adding a few more areas to Residue Processing.

Read full topic

item.title: Next Uncut Chapter?
item.dc:creator: Nonimportantuser
item.description:
Crawfish:

Inbound: Uncut.
It’ll be a combination including all cut versions from the original Half-Life, generously provided by Gaben E. Well and his crackshot companions Rodney and Stiff.
In all, the train ride will last for about 20 minutes and include such tantalizing scenes as: Concrete corridor #372, Vending Machine, and even a fully functional rail shooter segment where Gordon has to shoot as many falling, teleporting headcrabs as possible. You have to hit at least 70%, or the tram will derail and fall, making you crash into the ceiling of an On A Rail map, forcing you to skip a large portion of the game.

This post started as an innocent joke. I’m sorry it went so far.

I honestly want someone to make this real as a mod for the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Next Uncut Chapter?
item.dc:creator: RK1
item.description:
Next Uncut will obviously be the entire HL2 campaign, plus the episodes.

Read full topic

item.title: Next Uncut Chapter?
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
With the light switch installed in AM lab… it’s all perfect enough. But seriously: Question asked - answer given. It’s time to close the thread, in my opinion, before it derails any further.

item.title: Next Uncut Chapter?
item.dc:creator: Nova_Terra
item.description:
Surface Tension tentalces uncut!We can see a path right after the batteries but it’s blocked and if I remember correctly there should be the tentacles after these rocks.Also i would like to see a Vent mod uncut because it will add a lot of atmosphere and we can see more scenes about HECU invasion and battles around Black Mesa.

Read full topic

item.title: Next Uncut Chapter?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Literally the only addition I can think of giving/re-adding from HL to RP is the implication of the HECU tossing bodies into the system to dispose of them, and that’d simply be a matter of adding a few chutes in the ceiling with gibshooters.
Even then I’m not sure how close RP is to the entity limit, so that might not even be a good idea.

As awesome as the setpieces in OAR:U were (and they were, especially the trainyard and the turntable), I don’t really think any chapter needs to be redone or given additions to now.

Read full topic

item.title: Next Uncut Chapter?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
No other chapter needs to be uncut. ST was borderline unfinished in its first release and got its fix-up. OaR had some extraneous stuff stripped out to reduce frustration and whatnot. Every other chapter exists pretty much in its entirety and then some.

Read full topic
